Key: ...Huh? Where am I...?
School...? When did I get to school?

(That's right. I think... I finished class, and...
uhh, it's... that's right. Lunch time.)

(I left home as usual and I should have... come to
school alone...)

That's right. Nothing's... out of the ordinary,
right?

(Something feels really off. My head feels
hazy...)
...Something feels weird.
What's the matter, Itsuka?
Oh... Tonomachi...

Hey... You don't look too good, man.
What's going on?

Oh... I just feel... weird. Like... my head feels
like... I'm in a daze...
You up late last night or something?

I slept really well, so I don't think that's it.
I just felt dizzy when I was walking just now.
Hmm... I see.

Oh... And I feel chills, and I have a runny nose,
and my head's aching.
Wait, Itsuka... Those symptoms sound familiar.
Hm...? What could it be...
It's definitely... a cold.
O-Oh... You might be right.
(...Come to think of it, it is a cold.)

(But I don't remember being like this earlier in
the morning. Maybe I can't remember 'cause
everything's hazy, but I probably do have a cold.)
I guess you get colds too, huh?
Hey, what do you mean by that?
I mean, you know the saying, Itsuka doesn't catch
There's no saying like... *a-choo*!
(Okay... This is definitely a cold.)

Ah, I see. A cold. Yes, of course... So you've
gotten sick. I see, I see.
(...Why's this idiot looking so happy?)

In a time like this, I personally must take you to
the infirmary. That's the duty of a sworn friend.

Man, and I had plans, too... but you're my friend,
you know? This sucks so bad... friendship
suuuuucks.
...Hehehe.

You just laughed, didn't you?
In such a creepy way...

What are you talking about, Itsuka-kun? How could
I be happy when a dear friend is ill? Now then,
let's go to the dream infirmary!
...Huh? What dream infirmary?

Are you that dumb, Itsuka-kun?! The infirmary
means Tohka-sensei!
...Tohka-sensei?

Yes. The mistress of the infirmary, Tohka
Yatogami-sensei!

Oh... I-Is that so? The young teacher that just
joined the school, right...?

(I don't remember when she first started, but
she's a young and pretty teacher who became
popular among the students.)

(I heard the infirmary's been more crowded than
usual because of her.)

Hey, seriously, you really do seem sick. Forget
what I want. I'll go with you.

You just admitted that you have ulterior motives!
It's fine. I can go to the infirmary on my own.
Besides, class is about to start.
...See, there's the bell.
B-But, Itsuka! Are you really all right?
Yeah, I don't think it's that bad...

Grr... Damn it! Then I'll tell the teacher that
you went to the infirmary. I don't want you
to faint or anything.

(I guess despite his ulterior motives, he really
was worried.)
Okay. Thanks.

Take care. And you'd better tell me about Tohka-
sensei tomorrow!
(I guess... he's still worried about me?)
...I feel like my fever's going down.

(But just walking to the infirmary was tiring.
Maybe it's because of this cold.)

Well, I guess I can take some meds and sleep it
off... Excuse me.
Hm? Oh, Shido-kun. What's the matter?

(So this is Tohka Yatogami-sensei. She's pretty,
smart, and down-to-earth. A great teacher.)
I feel a bit sick... Is it okay if I rest here?
What? A cold? That's not good.
It's just a normal cold...

You shouldn't underestimate it. You know...
illnesses are... the root of... you know?
...The root of many illnesses?
Yeah! That!

(...Huh? My image of her was smart and capable for
some reason...)

But fear not. Just leave it to me, Shido! I mean,
Shido-kun!

I was thinking that earlier, but now I'm suddenly
worried.

Hm. That's not good. Your condition must have
worsened.

What, are you serious?! It's clearly not a symptom
of a cold!

Heh... The cold is making you say such nonsense,
Shido-kun. I said so, so it must be true. Besides,
I am the nurse! And I have glasses on!
I don't think the glasses do anything...
It's fine, just stay put. Got it?
...O-Okay.
(Tohka-sensei put her hand on my forehead.)
Oh...

(Her cool hand and how close she was made my heart
pound.)
Hm... You do seem to have a fever.

Oh... I knew it. And my head hurts, I have a runny
nose... *a-choo*!... And I'm sneezing.
I see. This is pretty bad.
It is?!

Yes, it is. We need to have you treated
this instant.

Th-Then... Um, if I can take some meds and just
lie down...

Now, wait. First, I must examine you. You sit
there, Shido-kun.
*Sigh*... Okay.

Hmmm... Your complexion seems a bit flushed. Now
open your mouth.
Okay... Ahhh....

Hm... Okay... It doesn't look like you have any
cavities.

Why are you looking for cavities?! You should be
checking for a swollen throat!

Oh, really?! Yes, you're right. Okay. It doesn't
seem swollen.

(...Is she really a capable teacher? I've only
seen reasons to worry thus far...)

Next, we're going to take your temperature!
Judging from one's hand isn't enough!
Okay. Then... can I get a thermometer...
Wait, Tohka-sensei?!
(*Thunk*... She put her forehead on mine.)
S-So close...!

(Tohka-sensei's porcelain cheeks and plump lips
are right in front of me...!)

Stay still, Shido-kun. This is the best way to
take your temperature.
Th-There's no way...
Hm. 99 degrees.
Is that accurate?!

My forehead has the ability to measure accurate
temperatures. Because I am the nurse!
I've never heard of a nurse having those abilities!
Okay... Next, show me your stomach, Shido-kun.
She's not even listening... Okay, fine.

(I've talked so much, I feel like my condition's
getting worse...)

(I lifted my shirt, and Tohka-sensei put her
stethoscope on my chest―)
Hmm, hmm. Uh-huh...

Um, excuse me?! Where are you putting that
stethoscope?! I totally made a weird noise
just now.

D-Don't worry. I-I am a teacher. Of course I can
handle seeing your bare body! I'm not nervous
at all!

Wait, you're totally looking in the other
direction! You have to check me thoroughly!

S-So you want me to... look? If you say so,
Shido-kun... I will cooperate and look at all
the areas you find embarrassing...!

Wait, you're making me sound like I'm requesting
something weird!

I...It's fine, sensei. Please, just give me some
meds and I'll sleep it off.
*A-choo*!

...! I knew it. You're in grave condition,
Shido-kun... Don't worry! I can treat you!

No, like I said, it's just a cold... Um,
Tohka-sensei? Why are you taking
gauze out of the cabinet?

When things are as grave as this, it's natural to
use gauze! This is how I will treat you,
Shido-kun!
But, it's pointless to use that on a cold!
You'll be all right now. Leave it to me.

So I do this... and then this... huh? How odd...?
No, if I do this here... Hm? ARGH! HERE!
W-Wait... Sensei...!
Hm...? Hmmm, what's going on...
H-Hey! What are you doing?!

I-It's fine. I'll take this hand and... hm, that's
weird. But this time this is... Aww... mmm. AHHH!

Then I'll use this...! Mm... Ah... mmm... Hmm...
Th-This is odd...
S-Sensei, let me help you.

I-It's fine! I'm the teacher... Mm... kuu... Mm.
Shido-kun... Y-You... just watch... there...
Just watch without helping.
Help Tohka.
O-Okay... Whatever you say.

Mm... Th-That's it... There―Mmph! Y-You watch!
I-I'll undo it right now... Ah!
(Wh-Why is she making those sounds...)

Sh-Shido kun, you... just... watch...
there... Ooh.

Um, sensei... I feel like I'm about to see a lot
of things I shouldn't...
D-Don't look! Don't look, Shido-kun!
O-Okay!
(I hastily turned my back toward her.)

Hu... *grunt*... I-If I can take this off... Ah!
No! This time, this side is... hyah! Oof!

I-It's digging in... A...ha...a...a! I-I can't...
this isn't... Nooo!

(Gosh... Not being able to see what's going on
makes it sound even worse...!)

Mm...! ...F...nn...NNNN! AH! M...mmmmm...!
*pant, pant*...

Oh... Ya...! No! This is... m...mmm...
*pant, pant*...!

...Mua...m...ah...ha...mmm! ...*pant*...
Sh-Shido...kun.
...Yes?
H...Help me, please...
(I knew she'd say that...)

...Th-That's right. Right there... more... mm!
Ah... *pant*... Yes... th-there...!
No... More... gently... please.
*Pant*... Mm... A-Aaaaah...
This is the last one...!
Ah... Ha... Mmm!

Seriously, this is impossible for you to get out
of alone. I'll help!
Aww... B-But, I'm the teacher...

(Tohka-sensei moved her body about for a moment
before promptly giving up...)

...I don't think I can get out on my own...
Shido-kun, please help me...

If you're that tangled up, of course you can't.
Let me help you now.

Um... where should we start...
...Oh.

What's the matter, Shido-kun? You must hurry and
get me out of this.

Um... well... I feel like I might see a lot of
inappropriate things...
D-Don't look, Shido-kun!
B-But... I need to see, or I can't help you...

*Whimper*... Th-Then... Try not to look so much
while you help me.
I-I'll... try.

(That's going to be super difficult. But I can't
just stare at her like this.)

(I tried my best to not look at her as I reached
out toward the gauze.)

Haah! N-Not there... If you pull on that, it won't
be good... a-ahhh!
S-S-S-Sorry! Then, how about here?

Ahh! Sh-Shido-kun... It's rubbing up against me...
It's no good...!
Th-Then, here...?!
Yahh! *pant*...
Then, here...!

Ah...mmm... You can't do so much there.
Th-That tickles...?!

(*Whimper* I'm looking away, so I don't really
know what I'm doing. But I know for sure it's
inappropriate!)
Th-Then, how about this...!

Hah... ha...ah...mmm! Mmm...*pant*!
Ah, ahhh... haaah!
Argh! How about this?!
Hey... Don't pull so hard... Nooo!
U...Uggh!
Somehow... I managed to do it...!
Yeah... Um... Shido-kun. Th-Thank... you...
No... I'm sorry about that.

N-No... It's fine. I-I'm the one... who should
be... apologizing.
Well... um... fa...
...Fa...*FACHOOO*!
Shido-kun?!
Aww... M-My head... hurts...

(That's right. I have a cold. Moving so much
is only going to aggravate it.)
C-Crap... I'm feeling cold...

Shido-kun...?! We can't help it... We'll have to
go into surgery!
We can't do that! Give me some meds! MEDS, please!

B-But... It got worse because of me. I feel like
it's not enough to just give you some medication.

No, giving me the medication and letting me
sleep... is something I'd appreciate the most...
P-Please...
Hmm... F-Fine...
F-Finally... I can rest...

(That was horrible... I lay down on the bed and
closed my eyes.)

(Next to the bed, Tohka-sensei sat and watched
over me. I closed my eyes and felt like I could
still see her expression.)

Hurry up and get better, Shido-kun. I'll watch
over you.
(Haha... Tohka... is Tohka no matter what―.)
